Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in forming your Doing Business As (DBA) name under your Limited Liability Company (LLC). We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the DBA Statement with your respective state agency, as well as handling any publication requirements, if applicable.
For your reference, general information regarding establishing a DBA has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
A Doing Business As (DBA) name registration allows the LLC to operate under a name other than the legal name of the entity. Upon registering the DBA, the LLC will be able to conduct business under the DBA name.
For your convenience, we have listed below all relevant pricing, as well as some additional services that may be beneficial to your business.
DOING BUSINESS AS Standard - $99.00 + filing fee - (7-20 business days)
To view the filing fee for your state, please follow the "PACKAGE DETAILS" link below and select your state from the drop-down list
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/legal-dba/dba-doing-business-as-overview.html PACKAGE DETAILS http://www.legalzoom.com/legal-dba/dba-pricing.html
ADDITIONAL SERVICES EIN Obtainment - $79.00 Business License Compliance Package - $74.99
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
